title: Track Papers We Love Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Papers We Love (papers-we-love/papers-we-love) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: Papers from the computer science community to read and discuss.

items.title: Papers We Love Updates on May 04, 2025
items.content_text:
### Info / Other Good Places to Find Papers

*   [alphaXiv](https://www.alphaxiv.org/) (Adds a discussion layer; replace "arxiv" with "alphaxiv" in an arXiv paper URL)
*   [arXiv Paper Repository](http://arxiv.org/)
*   [cat-v.org](http://doc.cat-v.org/)
*   [eugeneyan/applied-ml GitHub repository (⭐28k)](https://github.com/eugeneyan/applied-ml)
*   [Functional Programming Books Review](http://alexott.net/en/fp/books/)
*   [Gradual Typing Bibliography](http://samth.github.io/gradual-typing-bib/)
*   [Lobste.rs tagged as PDF](https://lobste.rs/t/pdf)
*   [SciRate](https://scirate.com/)
*   [Security Data Science Papers](http://www.covert.io/the-definitive-security-datascience-and-machinelearning-guide/)
*   [Services Engineering Reading List (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/mmcgrana/services-engineering)
*   [y-archive](http://yarchive.net/comp/index.html)
items.content_html:
Info / Other Good Places to Find Papers

  • alphaXiv (Adds a discussion layer; replace "arxiv" with "alphaxiv" in an arXiv paper URL)
  • arXiv Paper Repository
  • cat-v.org
  • eugeneyan/applied-ml GitHub repository (⭐28k)
  • Functional Programming Books Review
  • Gradual Typing Bibliography
  • Lobste.rs tagged as PDF
  • SciRate
  • Security Data Science Papers
  • Services Engineering Reading List (⭐3.7k)
  • y-archive
